content: The juice I used was pineapple juice, and it worked really well with the tequila and grenadine syrup. I'm actually looking for more ideas that are a bit more unique, something that's not as common as a Tequila Sunrise or Margarita. The Peach Tequila Spritz and Jalapeño Mango Mule sound interesting, but can you suggest more cocktails that incorporate vegetables or herbs into the mix? I've been experimenting with different flavors in my cooking, and I'd love to apply that to my cocktails as well.
